name: Classic Burger
description: A juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and cheese, served with a soft bun.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: A traditional cheese pizza with a crispy crust and a rich tomato base.

name: Chicken Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, fresh veggies, and a creamy sauce wrapped in a soft tortilla.

name: French Fries
description: Golden crispy fries served with ketchup or your choice of dipping sauce.

name: Chocolate Shake
description: A creamy chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A plant-based patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with pepperoni and mozzarella cheese.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Melted cheese between toasted slices of buttery bread.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Crispy fish fillets in soft tortillas with cabbage slaw and a tangy sauce.

name: Hot Dog
description: A classic hot dog with mustard, ketchup, and relish.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
description: A scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Pizza topped with BBQ chicken, onions, and mozzarella.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing mango smoothie with a hint of lime.

name: Chicken Nuggets
description: Crispy and tender chicken nuggets served with dipping sauce.
